title: my essence ward is missing
body:
i bought the essence collector ward skin with all my blue essence after the conversion and it was all i used up till today when i changed it and now i cant find it in my ward selection do i need to submit a ticket for this?

Edit: wow it seems a lot of people are experiencing this issue in quite suprised riot hasnt addressed this yet.

replies.body: the same thing happened to me D;
I have this issue too, I just want my blue essence ward back D:
I have that problem too. In the Purchase History there is proof, that you bought it, but the icon for it, its just poro with question mark.
